cause.description:
in our troubled world some people find that having sex with random ppl all the time is fun and exciting..well the truth is that this is exactly the case ntil one gets the horrible news that they have AIDS. Kary Iskander was one of these unfortunate souls and this cause is to help raise money for treatment so he doesnt have to die of this horrible disease.. so please donate anything, one dollar from everyone would be more than enough
1. AIDS needs to end
2. the ONE cause sucks..wut does that even mean
3. i dont want AIDS
cause.name: Kary has AIDS
